item.title: Maggie Q on the Future of ‘Ballard,’ Battling Typecasting and Learning to Pass on Opportunities: “I Can Say No to Things With a Smile on My Face”
item.description: After two decades in Hollywood, the newly married actress decided to step away from Los Angeles after losing her home in a mudslide; now she’s starring in one of the only L.A.-centric series on TV.

item.title: Maggie Q on Chasing a Woman-Hating Serial Killer in ‘Ballard,’ That Cliffhanger and the Scene That Made Her Say ‘I’m Going to Lose It!’
